Class WindowLogger.WindowOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • greenmirror.WindowLogger.WindowOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable
    Enclosing class:
    WindowLogger

    private static class WindowLogger.WindowOutputStream
extends OutputStream
    The OutputStream implementation that writes to the log window.
    Author:
    Karim El Assal

        public WindowOutputStream(EventHandler<WindowEvent> onHidden)

    • Method Detail

      • updateValues

        private void updateValues()
        Updates certain layout values. Can and should be used when the window has been resized. This has to be executed on the JavaFX thread.
